text: Time of the Gypsies (, Dom za vešanje, literally "Home for Hanging") is a 1988 Serbian fantasy crime drama movie directed by Emir Kusturica and starring Davor Dujmović, Bora Todorović, Ljubica Adžović. ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 comedy-drama movies Category:1988 fantasy movies Category:1988 crime drama movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Macedonian movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Emir Kusturica Category:Movies set in Serbia Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Time of the Gypsies
